alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 9:27AM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Lander and west central Elko Counties through 1000 AM PDT... At 926 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles south of Midas, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Midas, Willow Creek Reservoir, and Midas Mine. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County
